summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffery Edwards and Glenn Dubin discussing trust issues in personal relationships, using a metaphor related to marriage and financial markets. The conversation touches on the impact of betrayal on trust and the challenges of rebuilding it.

persons.name: Jeffery Edwards
persons.context: Jeffery Edwards is the sender of the email discussing trust issues in relationships.

persons.name: Glenn Dubin
persons.context: Glenn Dubin is the recipient of the email and is mentioned in the context of discussing financial markets and personal relationships.

keyFacts: The email discusses trust issues in personal relationships, likening them to the financial markets.
Jeffery Edwards uses a metaphor about a wife catching her husband with her best friend to illustrate the breakdown of trust.
The conversation implies that rebuilding trust takes time and effort, and it may never return to its original state.
Glenn Dubin is mentioned as having sent interesting pieces about the credit crisis to Jeffery Edwards.
